page.title: 08Local Events in Epworth.
page.content: One local event in Epworth which is held annually in September is{The {Festival of the Plough.}It is a one day gathering of people interested in the preservation of agricultural equipment and traditions.Old farming methods are demonstrated and competitions are held.This event has only been held for a few years though it has proved such a big success that it will almost certainly be continued for many years into the future. In August each year{The Epworth {Show}takes place. Agricultural equipment is once again featured although there is a wide range of other attractions . These include various rides,show jumping,stuntmen, displays of crafts and trades,and many competitions.
